criterion: Provides a list of snacks that are high in fiber and low in added sugars
Mentions that portion control is important for weight management
Recommends specific snack foods that are high in protein and low in fat
Fails to mention the importance of regular physical activity for weight management
Provides a simple and easy-to-understand explanation of how snacks can aid in weight management
Asks the user about their current diet and physical activity level to provide more personalized advice
Recommends snacks that are not suitable for people with certain dietary restrictions (e.g., gluten-free, vegan)
Provides a general tip about choosing snacks that are nutrient-dense
Fails to provide any specific snack recommendations
Tells the user to consult a healthcare professional for personalized advice
